name: sequences
description: A set of tools for quickly processing data in a streaming way

scripts.cmd-build-docs: (find ./src -name *.js | sort -t/ -k2.2 -k2.1 | xargs jsdoc2md --separators --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --member-index-format list --template README.hbs --files) > README.md

author: James Larsen (somesocks@gmail.com)
